title: Describe a memorable experience you had at a park.

korean: 작년 봄에 친구들이랑 공원에서 벚꽃 보러 간 게 기억에 남아.
사람들이 엄청 많았는데, 그래도 자리 잡고 앉을 수 있었어.
돗자리 깔고 김밥이랑 과일 같은 거 준비해 갔어.
날씨도 완벽했고, 바람이 살짝 불 때마다 꽃잎이 떨어지는 게 예뻤어.
특히 벚꽃 터널에서 찍은 사진들이 진짜 잘 나왔어.
옆에서 버스킹하는 사람들도 있어서 음악도 들을 수 있었어.
아이들이 뛰어다니는 모습 보니까 분위기가 더 좋았어.
다음 해에도 꼭 같은 시기에 또 가기로 약속했어.
english: Last spring, I went to see cherry blossoms at the park with friends, and, like, that's memorable.
The cherry blossoms were in full bloom, so it was, you know, really spectacular.
There were tons of people, but we were still able to find a spot and sit.
We spread out a mat and brought kimbap and fruits and stuff.
The weather was perfect, and whenever the wind blew slightly, the petals falling were pretty.
We took, like, so many pictures with friends.
Especially the photos taken in the cherry blossom tunnel came out really well.
There were also people busking nearby, so we could, you know, listen to music.
Seeing children running around made the atmosphere even better.
We stayed until evening, and when we were about to go home, I felt regretful.
We promised to, like, definitely go again at the same time next year.
It was a truly healing and happy day.
